availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, resident. Pennsylvania native. Father of John McMath. Married to Alidia Miller McMath in Bracken County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1861. Resident of Bracken County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 431B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Bracken County Marriages.
"William L McMath (1789-1867)," Find A Grave, Memorial #6316075, Accessed July 13, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6316075.
